oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā mukhtaṣar kitāb Qaṭf al-azhār min al-Khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār, mukhtaṣar al-Khiṭaṭ lil-Maqrīzī / lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah ... Sibṭ Āl al-Ṣiddīq Mawlānā Abū al-Surūr al-Ṣiddīqī al-Bakrī : manuscript, undated
Mukhtaṣar al-Khiṭaṭ
Qaṭf al-azhār min al-Khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn Abī al-Surūr, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad , 1596 or 1597-1676 or 1677
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in several hands, in one column, from 17 to 25 lines per page, in black ink, framed within double red lines.
According to the colophon (f. 168r), copy completed on 12 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1010 AH [September 9, 1601 AD]. But this date does not seem to be correct.
On inside front cover, seal of a Bookshop: Maisonneuve et Cie, 15 Quai Voltaire, Paris.
MS Arab SM156. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: قطف الأزهار من الخطط والآثار
هذا مختصر كتاب قطف الأزهار من الخطط والآثار، مختصر الخطط للمقريزي / للشيخ الإمام العالم العلامة ... سبط آل صديق مولانا أبو السرور الصديقي البكري : مخطوطة، undated
مختصر الخطط
